summary:
Male and Female. V2 is up!
Golden paint in the metal parts with golden veins throughout the armor.
descriptionHtml:
V2 is up!
-removed some shine and darkened the bone parts so now the armor don\'t look as \"striped\" as before.
-added a brown tone to the leather parts so they don\'t blend as much with the bone ones.
-lighten up just a bit some metal parts.

This is not really an improvement, it\'s more of a subtle change. Both files are up, see screenshots and choose which one suits you better.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Based on feedback on my previous texture mod, evil daedric dragonplate, I started messing with gimp and got completely out of the way of how it should go. Turned out to be something nice imo so i decided to go on and here it is.

Still improving that previous texture tho:
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2754

Feel free to use this file anyway you want. Just give proper credit.

Have fun.
author: Kameltosis
